General.Name: Strikewell Energy Corp
General.Description: Strikewell Energy Corp., an exploration and production company, owns petroleum and natural gas interests in Alberta, Canada. It owns a 100% working interest in the Garrington property that covers an area of 640 acres located in Garrington area. The company was incorporated in 1971 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: Granville Park, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6H 4B9

1.Name: Mr. Scott R. Hislop CA, CPA
